amendment.description: To require a report on the security relationship between the United States and the Republic of Cyprus.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2050 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2050 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270) To require a report on the security relationship between the United States and the Republic of Cyprus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2050 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2050 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 1463.
